column2: Modern House for Sale in Nawala
column6: Situated 200 metres away from the main Nawala Road, at Queens Park Residencies. This 2 storey modern house is built on 12 perches and has a total floor area of 3,500 sq.ft. It has 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. There’s AC in 3 bedrooms, and all hot water in all bathrooms, powered by solar. Separate tv room and maid’s quarters available. Also has a garden, rooftop terrace, indoor pond, and parking space for 1 vehicle. The housing scheme has a swimming pool and gym. Price Rs. 60Mn.

column2: Luxury architect designed house for sale in Nawala

Expecting Lkr 60 million.
